title: Personal question on Saving Money
body:
What do you guys do in terms of saving up for your future?

I hear different things here and there... like putting in 10% of your paycheck into a savings account, or a flat amount varying on preference. I'm still new to all of this and wonder what I should do...

What are your thoughts, GD?

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DGKVS6GUMAAY5YQ.jpg
